Privacy Policy

Last Updated: December 2024

1. Introduction

This Privacy Policy describes how we handle information when you use our AI-powered Text-to-Speech (TTS) service. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring transparency about our data practices.

2. Local Processing

This TTS service operates entirely in your browser using local processing. This means:

  • No Text Transmission: Your text input is never sent to external servers
  • No Audio Transmission: Generated audio is created and played locally in your browser
  • No Cloud Processing: All voice synthesis happens on your device using downloaded models
  • Complete Privacy: Your content remains private and never leaves your device

3. Data We Collect

We collect minimal data to provide and improve the service:

3.1 Usage Statistics (Optional)

We may collect anonymous usage statistics including:

  • Which voices are most frequently used
  • Aggregate usage duration per voice
  • General service performance metrics

Important: These statistics are anonymized and do not include any personal information, text content, or audio data.

3.2 Browser Storage

The service uses your browser's local storage (IndexedDB) to:

  • Store downloaded voice models
  • Cache voice list information
  • Maintain local usage statistics

This data is stored locally on your device and is not transmitted to us.

4. How We Use Information

Any information we collect is used solely to:

  • Improve the service and voice quality
  • Understand which voices are popular
  • Optimize performance and user experience
  • Provide voice popularity rankings

5. Data Sharing

We do not sell, trade, or share your personal information with third parties. The only data transmission occurs when:

  • Downloading voice models from the Piper repository (public models)
  • Sending anonymous usage statistics (if enabled, contains no personal data)
  • Fetching the voice list from the repository (public information)

6. AI and Machine Learning

This service uses AI phonetic technology and neural networks:

  • Local AI Processing: All AI processing happens in your browser using ONNX Runtime
  • No Training Data: We do not use your text or audio to train models
  • Pre-trained Models: Voice models are pre-trained and downloaded, not customized with your data
  • No Learning from Usage: The AI does not learn or adapt based on your usage

7. Cookies and Tracking

This service does not use cookies or tracking technologies. We do not employ:

  • Advertising cookies
  • Analytics tracking pixels
  • Third-party tracking scripts
  • Behavioral tracking

8. Third-Party Services

The service may interact with:

  • Piper Repository: To download voice models (public repository)
  • CDN Services: To load fonts and external resources

These interactions are necessary for the service to function but do not involve transmitting your personal data.

9. Data Security

Since all processing happens locally in your browser:

  • Your data never leaves your device
  • No network transmission of sensitive content
  • Browser security features protect stored data
  • You control what is stored in your browser

10. Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Delete Data: Clear browser storage to remove all locally stored data
  • Uninstall Voices: Remove any installed voice models at any time
  • Disable Statistics: Clear local statistics or disable collection (if implemented)
  • Stop Using Service: Simply stop using the service - no account deletion needed

11. Children's Privacy

This service does not knowingly collect information from children under 13. Since we don't collect personal information, this service is safe for all ages. However, we recommend parental supervision for children using any online services.

12. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify users of any material changes by updating the "Last Updated" date. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

13. International Users

This service is available globally. Since all processing happens locally in your browser, your data is subject to your local jurisdiction's privacy laws, not ours.

14. Contact Us

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us through our GitHub repository.

15. Summary

In simple terms: This service runs entirely in your browser. We don't see your text, we don't hear your audio, and we don't track you. The only data we might collect is anonymous statistics about which voices are popular, and even that stays on your device until you choose to share it (if at all).
